title: Full rebuild: notifications, ads, premium redesign, language-aware UI, and new splash logo

requirements.summary: Fix in-app toast notifications to appear after task/trust completion with 3-second auto-dismiss, slide-in animation, app logo, language-aware messages, and click-to-dismiss support
acceptanceCriteria: Toast appears every time a task or trust item is completed
Toast auto-dismisses after exactly 3 seconds
Toast slides in from the top with animation and slides out on dismiss
Message text is in Bengali when Bengali is selected, English when English is selected
Clicking the toast dismisses it immediately

file_operations.description: Update the NotificationToast component to enforce exactly 3-second auto-dismiss timing (currently 3.5s), ensure slide-in/slide-out animations work correctly, display the app logo, accept language-aware message text, and support immediate dismissal on click. Verify that CSS keyframes in index.css support the animation requirements.

Update the useNotification hook to enforce exactly 3-second auto-dismiss timing (adjust from current 3.5s) and ensure it integrates with the LanguageContext to pass language-aware messages to the NotificationToast.

Wire the notification system to trigger a toast when a task is completed via the 2-second press-and-hold gesture. Use the NotificationContext to show a language-aware completion message from translations.ts.
Add translation keys for task completion and trust completion toast messages in both English and Bengali. Include keys like 'taskCompleted', 'trustCompleted' with appropriate congratulatory text.

requirements.summary: Place a visible ad banner at the very bottom of the Home screen above the bottom navigation bar, visible only to non-premium users
acceptanceCriteria: Ad banner is rendered at the bottom of the Home page above the nav bar
Banner is not shown to premium users
Banner is visible and not auto-dismissed

file_operations.description: Add a visible ad banner component (AdMobBanner or AdBanner) at the bottom of the Home page, positioned above the bottom navigation bar. Ensure it is only rendered for non-premium users by checking usePremiumStatus. The banner must be visible by default and not auto-dismissed.

requirements.summary: Place a visible ad banner at the very bottom of the History page, fixed below all history entries, visible only to non-premium users
acceptanceCriteria: Ad banner is rendered at the bottom of the History page
History items grow upward above the banner as more are added
Banner is not shown to premium users
Banner is always visible and not auto-dismissed

file_operations.description: Add a visible ad banner component (AdMobBanner or AdBanner) at the bottom of the History page, ensuring it remains fixed below all history entries. As new entries are added, they should stack upward while the banner stays at the bottom. Only render the banner for non-premium users by checking usePremiumStatus. The banner must be visible by default and not auto-dismissed.

requirements.summary: Redesign the premium modal to match Screenshot 2 with crown emoji, 7-item checklist, info box, Promo Code/Purchase Code tabs, email icon/button, and Trial button with 1-minute access
acceptanceCriteria: Modal layout matches Screenshot 2 with dark background, gold accents

Purchase Code tab accepts RUBELBOSS987 and activates premium

file_operations.description: Redesign the modal to match Screenshot_20260225_213446_Chrome.jpg. Add crown emoji + 'Premium' title, close button, 7-item feature checklist, info box with '‚è∞ Premium stays active for up to 1 year. It will automatically reset after 1 year.', two tabs ('Promo Code' and 'Purchase Code'), code input field, and orange 'Activate' button. Implement promo code validation for '987987' and '789789', purchase code validation for 'RUBELBOSS987', and show error messages for invalid codes. Add an email icon/button that copies 'mdjahidhasanrubel73@gmail.com' to clipboard and opens mailto: link.
